context: <b4_0>Numerous immigrants<b4_0/> have come as merchants and become a major part of the business community, including Lebanese, Indians, and other West African nationals. There is a high percentage of <b5_0>interracial marriage<b5_0/> between ethnic <a0_0>Liberians and the Lebanese<a0_0/>, resulting in <a1_0><b7_0>a significant mixed-race population<b7_0/><a1_0/> especially in and around Monrovia. A small minority of Liberians of European descent reside <a2_0><b6_0><b8_0>in the country<b8_0/><b6_0/><a2_0/>.[better source needed] The Liberian constitution restricts citizenship to people of <a3_0>Black African descent.
